@graph.name: Shikanji Nimbu Pani (Indian Lemonade)
@graph.description: Shikanji or Nimbu Pani is a spiced drink similar to lemonade. It needs just 7 ingredients and is a refreshing drink for summer. Indian Lemonade or limeade. Vegan Shikanji Recipe
recipeIngredient: Juice of 1 lime (, 1.5 limes if the lime is small)
1/4 tsp Indian chaat masala, or 1/8 to 1/4 tsp kala namak ((indian sulphur salt), or 1/8 tsp dry mango powder)
lime slices for garnish, mint leaves for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients until well combined. Taste and adjust sweet, tang, salt and indian black salt flavor. (The mix can now be refrigerated for upto 2 days, or refrigerate to chill)
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the ingredients until well combined. Taste and adjust sweet, tang, salt and indian black salt flavor. (The mix can now be refrigerated for upto 2 days, or refrigerate to chill)

recipeInstructions.text: Serve in glasses over ice cubes. Garnish with mint or sliced lime. See variations in notes.
